caption:
This photograph captures a sunny, outdoor setting at a gas station, featuring a man fueling a boat that is mounted on a trailer. The man, dressed in black and white checkered pants and a dark vest over a light shirt, is seen holding a fuel pump nozzle to the boat's tank. The boat is predominantly white, with an outboard motor visible at its rear and is attached to a screened trailer labeled "Vanson".

The background of the shot includes glimpses of commercial buildings; notably one with a sign that reads "Trading Post," advertising Indian crafts and decorations. The gas station has several fuel pumps and other typical gas station equipment set on a paved area. The sky is clear and vividly blue, suggesting a bright sunny day, enhancing the sharpness and color saturation in the photograph. The overall setting indicates a routine activity of preparing for a boating trip, possibly near a town that caters to recreational or tourist activities.
title: Preparing for cruise on Lake Powell
